title: BRIEF-Keras Resources Says Co To Post Circular On Proposed Distribution Of Stake In Calidus
text:
BRIEF-Keras Resources Says Co To Post Circular On Proposed Distribution Of Stake In Calidus

Stock Markets 41 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 16:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Keras Resources Says Co To Post Circular On Proposed Distribution Of Stake In Calidus Sept 27 (Reuters) - Calidus Resources Ltd : * KERAS RESOURCES ANNOUNCED DISTRIBUTION OF CALIDUS SHARES & PROPOSED CAPITAL REDUCTION * KERAS RESOURCES - WILL POST CIRCULAR DETAILING PROPOSED DISTRIBUTION OF 33.71% STAKE IN CALIDUS RESOURCES TO CO'S SHAREHOLDERS

BRIEF-Keras Resources Says Co To Post Circular On Proposed Distribution Of Stake In Calidus
description: BRIEF-Keras Resources Says Co To Post Circular On Proposed Distribution Of Stake In Calidus
